name.help: This will be name of this instance for learning analytics
name.label: Name
name.placeholder: Name of this current widget instance

alt.help: This is the alternative text for the image in terms of accesibility
alt.label: Alternative text for the image

help.label: Help
help.help: This will be the text for helping the user understand the interaction with the widget. If left in blank, it will take the default text.

feedback.help: Intdouce the feedback that the student occurred whether he answered correctly or incorrectly
feedback.label: Feedback

captions.label: Subtitles (CC)
captions.help: INDIeMedia URL of the file containing the dialogue transcript, sound effects, music tracks, and other audio information for when the viewer is deaf or hard of hearing, or if the video/audio is muted. Subtitles are also displayed over the video.

descriptions.label: Descriptions
descriptions.help: INDIeMedia URL of the file containing text descriptions of what happens in the video for when the part of the video is not available because the viewer is blind and does not use a screen. Descriptions are read by a screen reader or converted to a separate audio track.

bookmark.help: This is the bookmark that will appear in the upper side of the unit as a section bookmark. It can have a maximum of 40 characters.
bookmark.label: Section bookmark

image.help: This image will be shown as the background image of the heading. This will apply only if the type is set in BackgroundImage
image.label: Background image

type.help: If the type is set in 'Background color', a default color will appear under the title, whereas in 'Image', you will have to select a background image for the section header.
type.label: Background Type

author.help: Write here the author of the unit.
author.label: Unit author

institution.label: Institution
institution.placeholder: Write the name of the institution

resource.help: Write the id of the resource
resource.label: Resource ID:

theme.help: Choose the theme of the unit.
theme.label: Theme

title.help: Set the title of the content group. It will appear in the title of the drop-down menu.
title.label: Content title

height.help: This will be the animation container height in pixels
height.label: Animation height

image.help: This will be the complete picture of the animation.
image.label: Image URL

width.help: This will be the animation container width in pixels
width.label: Animation width

audio.help: This URL is the source of the audio file

definition.help: This definition is the textual transcription of the audio
definition.label: Definition

term.help: This will be the term placed on the left of the widget
term.label: Term

alignment.help: The quote can appear on the right or on the left
alignment.label: Quote alignment

caption.help: The quote caption appears below the quote, it is mainly used to indicate the author or authors of the quote.
caption.label: Quote caption

quote.help: This text is the textual quote.
quote.label: Quote text
quote.placeholder: Example: 'The absence of evidence is not evidence of absence'

source.help: Original source of the quote (Year, book, magazine ... etc)
source.label: Quote source

image.help: This will be the image that appears in the center of the widget.
image.label: Image URL
image.placeholder: Click here to write the image URL

options.help: These 4 option will appear below the image. Only one of them should be correct.
options.label: Options

text.help: This text will appear on top of the image as a quesiton or a sentence.
text.label: Text

image.help: This is the image associated with the element. The user will have to form the couple with the other element.
image.label: Image URL

text.help: This text is associated with the element. The user will have to form the couple with the other element.
text.label: Text

definition.help: The definition appears to the right of the interactive element and the student must drag the term to the definition
definition.label: Definition
definition.placeholder: Example: All human beings have the right to express themselves without being harassed because of what they think

term.help: The term appears to the left of the interactive element and will be the one that the student has to drag and drop on the definition.
term.label: Term

answers.help: You must write at least 2 answers and mark which of them is correct.
answers.label: Possible answers

questionPreview.help: This is how you would see the question in the content unit.
questionPreview.label: Question preview

caption.label: Image caption

image.label: Image URL
